meanings.definition: A sandwich consisting of a cooked patty of ground meat, usually beef, placed inside a sliced bread roll or bun.
meanings.sent1: I ate a tasty burger for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The burger at the restaurant was delicious.
meanings.sent3: Why did the burger go to the gym? To get better buns!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as satisfying as biting into a juicy burger.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling burger made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A patty of ground meat, usually beef, cooked and served as a sandwich.
meanings.sent1: My brother loves to grill burgers on weekends.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a cheeseburger with fries for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The burger told a funny joke to the fries.
meanings.sent4: His words were a burger for my hungry soul.
meanings.sent5: The juicy burger dripped with savory goodness.
